Reviews.Title: amazon's 3 listings are for the same camera
Reviews.Author: Michelle M. Ress "safoocat"
Reviews.Content: The various listings on amazon for the dxg 506 are all the same cameras.The only difference is the colors be it black, blue, silver, or pinkso the reviews that purtain to one of them would apply to all of them.If you want a low priced video recorder that will fit in your pocket, store on an SD card, and use AA batteries this would fit that bill.Aside from the weak low light performance the worst thing I've foundon the camera is the lens cap tends to fall off.

Reviews.Title: Julian
Reviews.Author: Julian Guillen
Reviews.Content: La compre hace algun tiempo los videos son regulares de calidad vaja, las fotos son pesimas, y gasta denasiada bateria, se que es muy economica pero deberian mejorar el producto

ProductInfo.Features:
Image resolution up to 2592 x 1944
Digital multi-function: camcorder, still camera, MP3 player, voice recorder, and PC cam
White balance with settings for Fluorescent, Cloudy, Sunny, and Tungsten
PictBridge compatible
Includes 32MB internal memory, four AAA alkaline batteries, earphones, USB and AV cables, pouch, wrist strap, and software
ProductInfo.Name: DXG DXG-506VK 5.0 MegaPixel Multi-Functional Camera with MPEG4 Technology (Black)
